content: Pipeline: Supporting APIs | Jenkins pluginPipeline: Supporting APIsHow to installDocumentationReleasesIssuesDependenciesHealth Score Introduction This plugin provides APIs that are used by core Pipeline plugins for features such as persistence and step visualization.
